attributes.action: Care-packages for Elderly during COVID-19 Outbreak
attributes.additional_details: Elderly people are at greater risk of contracting the virus and they might have to self-isolate within weeks; essential items are unavailable in shops and online shopping has no availability for the next couple of weeks.
attributes.background: Work with big supermarkets in England to provide care packages to elderly people living in the UK during the outbreak of the Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302940

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
